message.body: I ordered a different fancy Malbec if you want to wait until tomorrow to give it to him...
Yay! Thanks. Theres a swarm of bees across the street that has settled in a tree ALSo the locusts are in bloom
The locusts! We will have to take a nice stroll amidst the locusts...
Hello there! Want me to run next door and throw your laundry in?
Sure, thanks babe! Can you take my big blue towel too? I think its on the bathroom door
No problem. How is everything back in second grade?
Girls had dinner, but I'm running a bit behind-would you mind taking them out?
